name: arrayDeleteAt
description:
Deletes the element at `index` from an array
The array will be resized, so that the deleted element doesn't leave a gap.

params.name: array
params.description: The array that the element will be deleted from.

params.name: index
params.description: The numeric index of the element. Remember that ColdFusion arrays start at 1 not 0.

examples.title: Simple example for arrayDeleteAt function
examples.description: Uses the arrayDeleteAt function to delete the value in specific position

examples.title: Simple example with member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Uses the member function is the same as running arrayDeleteAt.
